title: Did a "convicted terrorist" sit on the board of the BLM funding board?
subtitle: The former crimes of Susan Rosenberg reappeared in the summer of 2020, amid a new wave of protests against racial injustice and police brutality.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Susan Rosenberg (convicted terrorist) was a member of the board of directors of a thousand currents, a fund-raising organization for the Black Lives network.
